# init(icon:text:)

**Initializer**

Creates a search token with the specified text and icon (if any).

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(icon: UIImage?, text: String)
```

## Parameters

- **icon**: An image to display with the text.
- **text**: The text to display on the search token.

## Return Value

A new search token.

## Creating a search token

- **representedObject**: The object represented by the search token.

items.description: The object represented by the search token.
